bug.author: gvashishtha
bug.description:
This page should have an example of a config.json for using workspace.from_config() <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: 90efe042-27ac-6e77-9292-10df77bb1c36 Version Independent ID: 3b9f2576-7d3f-00f8-0afe-549960520f08 Content: azureml.core.Workspace class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-core/azureml.core.Workspace(class).yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @j-martens Microsoft Alias: jmartens

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gvashishtha>@gvashishtha</denchmark-link>
Thanks for the feedback! I have assigned the issue to the content author to investigate further and update the document as appropriate. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/j-martens>@j-martens</denchmark-link>
Hi Josee, could you take a look of this issue? There is some information missing here. Thanks!
We added a link to an example/discussion of the config in an article. The article has more context around the fields in the config. Change will appear in next SDK release in a few weeks. Thanks.
